title: HeliBoard integration
body: Just a quick question, how do I get HeliBoard to call Whisper instead of the Google voice assistant when pressing the mic button in the toolbar?
author: C-O-D

comments.body: Just switch off Google voice input method in Android settings

satisfaction_conditions: A simple method to configure HeliBoard to use Whisper instead of Google voice assistant
Instructions that don't require technical expertise or complex setup
